title: Asian stocks steady at open, Bitcoin dips again
description: Asian stocks traded in tight ranges as investors awaited fresh catalysts, with a cryptocurrency rebound losing steam. Mixed performance in regional markets mirrored Wall Street's cautious approach ahead of key central bank rate decisions. Traders are carefull…
